Deputy Prime Minister Michael McCormack has savaged Australian Open fans for booing the president of Tennis Australia after she mentioned coronavirus vaccines.

articles.author: Glenn Valencich
articles.title: Australian Open booing: Crowd slammed at Novak Djokovic final - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Novak Djokovic’s ninth title in Melbourne ended on a sour note after fans booed the mere mention of COVID-19 vaccines and the Victorian government.
articles.content:
The Deputy Prime Minister and an Aussie tennis champion have led a chorus of criticism towards the disgraceful fans who booed the mention of COVID-19 vaccines after the Australian Open final.
